meanings.definition: A horizontal timber in a scaffold, supporting the ends of the putlogs.
meanings.sent1: The putlog held up the scaffold securely.
meanings.sent2: Workers placed the putlog carefully to ensure stability.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the putlog as a balance beam.
meanings.sent4: The putlog stretched across the scaffold like a sturdy bridge.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the putlog made it easy to spot from afar.

meanings.definition: To insert or fix a putlog in place.
meanings.sent1: They putlog the timber firmly into position.
meanings.sent2: He putlogs the support beams with precision.
meanings.sent3: She likes to putlog the pieces together like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The workers putlogged the beams swiftly, completing the task in no time.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter putlogs the wood effortlessly, showcasing his skill.
